name: Decadence in the Compound Era - An Introduction
name_original: Decadence in the Compound Era - An Introduction
description:
A short adventure game about a future severed from the past where people get very upset about the historical accuracy of top hats.

Made as part of the March's #bitsyjam "unfinished business"

Thanks so much to Adam Le Doux for the Bitsy editor.

Thanks to Mark Wonnacott for Add Bitsy Audio and Max Bradbury for the Pixsy image maker. 

Music by me and Duke Ellington (I'll let you guess which one is which).

Let me know if you like this concept because I might keep going with it either in Bitsy or elsewhere!
